adrFormatAddress: 333 E 38th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I had a disappointing experience with Dr. Kim as I was rushed in my appointment and he did not seem to care or listen to my health concerns. No effort in getting to the root of the issue or figuring out next steps. I do not recommend.

text.text: I had a disappointing experience with Dr. Kim as I was rushed in my appointment and he did not seem to care or listen to my health concerns. No effort in getting to the root of the issue or figuring out next steps. I do not recommend.

originalText.text: I wen to Dr. Kim for acupuncture for neuropathy  in my foot. After only 7 visits, I felt a huge difference.  I can now walk more securely.  He is very professional and does a wonderful evaluation.  I highly recommend him.  The staff is welcoming and very helpful  They also take excellent care during these times, the place is spotless.

text.text: I wen to Dr. Kim for acupuncture for neuropathy  in my foot. After only 7 visits, I felt a huge difference.  I can now walk more securely.  He is very professional and does a wonderful evaluation.  I highly recommend him.  The staff is welcoming and very helpful  They also take excellent care during these times, the place is spotless.

originalText.text: My wife was referred to Dr. Kim for treatment of a back pain that becomes severe intermittently.  She was evaluated by his assistant for a while.  When Dr. Kim came and saw her,  he was dismissive of her problem, told her to take Tylenol and referred her to a physical therapist who was not available for the next 3 months.  Next day my wife had to be admitted to NYU hospital to manage the pain which went up to a level 10 in a scale of 10.  We are in our second day here at the hospital as I write this review.  My take on Dr. Kim is that he doesn’t listen or try to find the source of a pain that could mean going through h... for a patient and can care less for what the patient is going through.

originalText.text: I have been treated by Dr. Kim several times and I am extremely pleased with his treatment.  He is extremely knowledgeable about pain relief injections.. He does not prescribe narcotic pain medication.  He is very personable and spends a great deal of time discussing your medical problems and treatments.  I think he is wonderful.  Lila Noble

originalText.text: I have known Dr. Kim for several years.  I have known him to be very professional, very knowledgeable , he has the best "bedside' manner since he gives the facts and offers solutions and is very throrough.  He is the only person that I will ever trust with my condition.  He's the best.
